install.description: Install a Pliny recipe into your Next app

yes.name: yes
yes.description: Install the recipe automatically without user confirmation

args.name: recipe
args.description: Name of a Pliny recipe from timlrx/pliny/recipes, or a file path to a local recipe definition

args.name: recipe-flags
args.description: A list of flags to pass to the recipe. Pliny will only parse these in the form `key=value`

template.name: template
template.description: Pick your new app template. Options: starter-blog.

npm.name: npm
npm.description: Use npm as the package manager

yarn.name: yarn
yarn.description: Use yarn as the package manager

pnpm.name: pnpm
pnpm.description: Use pnpm as the package manager
